name: Hell Yeah!
description:
Please play the game in fullscreen mode for best experience.

Made for Ludum Dare 46.

Bored of sitting at home? 

Come and join us for a 3 day long party!

And guess what? You are the host and the club is yours! Just like that! No strings attached!*

Hell Yeah! is a time based puzzle game with lots of gorgeous pixel art, ear catching tunes and exploitable spaghetti code.

Keep the party alive!

How to play minigames:

- click and drag to get points for order from the top

- click on single tile to remove it

Game made by:

Art: @szupinek

Music and sound effects: @kate90

Code: @ryzy27

Stay safe,

* Strings attached.
